methods.name: configure

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.docs: - {@link Configuration} options for the GliaWidgets SDK.

tags.name: param
tags.text: configuration - {@link Configuration} options for the GliaWidgets SDK.

methods.docs:
Configures GliaWidgets SDK.

Note that for the SDK to work properly, the site API key needs to have the 'Create Visitor' permission only.

methods.name: subscribeToPushNotificationTypes
methods.docs: Subscribe to specific push notification types.

tags.name: deprecated
tags.text:
Use showEntryWidget() instead.
Shows Entry Widget.

tags.name: deprecated
tags.text:
Use `startSecureMessaging` instead.
Starts a Secure Conversation flow.
Note that Secure Conversation requires visitor authentication.

methods.name: startSecureMessaging
methods.docs:
Starts a Secure Conversation flow.
Note that Secure Conversation requires visitor authentication.

methods.name: clearVisitorSession
methods.docs:
Clears current Glia SDK session, and also resets the visitor ID and their local data.
Ends ongoing engagement (if any).

tags.name: deprecated
tags.text:
Use getQueues() instead.
Fetches all queues with its info for current site.

methods.name: getQueues

tags.name: returns
tags.text: - A collection of queues where the key is the queue ID and the value is a `Queue` object that describes the queue's details.

methods.docs: Fetches all queues and their information for the current site.

tags.name: deprecated
tags.text:
Use showVisitorCode() instead.
Presents a GliaWidgets alert with a visitor code to share with an operator to start an engagement.

methods.name: showVisitorCode
methods.docs: Presents a GliaWidgets alert with a visitor code to share with an operator to start an engagement.

methods.name: hideVisitorCode
methods.docs: Closes a GliaWidgets alert with a visitor code if it is currently visible.

methods.name: authenticate
methods.signature: (options: { behavior: AuthenticationBehavior; idToken: string; accessToken?: string; }) => Promise<void>

parameters.name: options
parameters.docs: - Provides options for authentication such as behavior, idToken, and accessToken.
parameters.type: { behavior: string; idToken: string; accessToken?: string | undefined; }

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - Provides options for authentication such as behavior, idToken, and accessToken.

methods.name: deauthenticate

parameters.name: options
parameters.docs: - Provides options to stop push notifications on deauthentication.

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - Provides options to stop push notifications on deauthentication.

methods.docs: Deauthenticates the visitor. Be aware that deauthentication process relies on `AuthenticationBehavior`.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: VisitorInfo - The information about a visitor.

methods.name: subscribeToUnreadMessageCount

parameters.name: callback
parameters.docs: - A callback function that will be invoked with the updated unread message count.

tags.name: param
tags.text: callback - A callback function that will be invoked with the updated unread message count.

methods.docs:
Subscribes to updates of the unread message count.

This method allows you to receive updates whenever the unread message count for
Secure Conversations changes. It does not count live chat messages.
The provided callback will be triggered with the updated count.

methods.name: unsubscribeFromUnreadMessageCount

parameters.name: callback
parameters.docs: - The same callback function instance that was previously subscribed to receive updates.

tags.name: param
tags.text: callback - The same callback function instance that was previously subscribed to receive updates.

methods.docs:
Unsubscribes from updates of the unread message count.

This method stops receiving updates for the unread message count for the provided callback.

properties.name: siteId
properties.docs: The Glia site ID.

tags.text:
Use `queueIds` during startChat, startAudio, or startVideo instead.
List of queue IDs to be used when requesting an engagement.
If `queueIds` is undefined or empty, the visitor is enqueued in the default queue(s).
tags.name: deprecated

properties.name: authorizationMethod
properties.docs:
The authorization method for the Glia site.
Supports both Site API Key (legacy) and User API Key.

properties.name: apiKey

tags.text: Use `authorizationMethod` instead. This field will be treated as a Site API Key.
tags.name: deprecated

properties.docs: The API key for the Glia site.

properties.name: region
properties.docs:
The region of the site.
Possible values are defined in the {@link Region}.

properties.name: companyName
properties.docs:
The name of the company.
This is used as the company name shown in the UI while establishing a connection with an operator.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: overrideLocale
properties.docs:
The name of the locale to be used instead of the default locale of the site.
If not provided, the default locale will be used.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: uiUnifiedConfig
properties.docs:
UI customization settings in a cross-platform format.
This can be a JSON object or a JSON string.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: visitorContextAssetId
properties.docs:
ID of the PDF asset containing additional visitor context for an operator.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: pushNotifications
properties.docs:
Push notifications environment to use.
NOTE: Only for iOS.
The default value is `PushNotificationsIOS.DISABLED`.

properties.name: enableBubbleOutsideApp
properties.docs:
A bubble shown outside the app during an engagement when the app is not in the foreground.
Available only on Android when a visitor grants Screen Overlay permission.
The default value is `true`.

properties.name: enableBubbleInsideApp
properties.docs:
A bubble shown within the app but outside the engagement view during an engagement.
The default value is `true`.

properties.name: suppressPushNotificationsPermissionRequestDuringAuthentication
properties.docs:
Whether to suppress push notification permission request during authentication.
The default value is `false`.

properties.name: siteApiKeyId
properties.docs: The site API key ID.

properties.name: siteApiKeySecret
properties.docs: The site API key secret.

properties.name: userApiKeyId
properties.docs: The user API key ID.

properties.name: userApiKeySecret
properties.docs: The user API key secret.

interfaces.name: ApiKey
interfaces.docs:
Used for configuring the Glia SDK with site API key ID and secret.

Note that for the SDK to work properly, the site API key needs to have the 'Create Visitor' permission only.

tags.text: Use `AuthorizationMethod` with `siteApiKey()` or `userApiKey()` helper functions instead.
tags.name: deprecated

properties.name: id
properties.docs: The ID of the site API key.

properties.name: secret
properties.docs: The site API key secret.

properties.name: is_default
properties.docs: Indicates if queue is default.

properties.name: media
properties.docs: Queue media types.

properties.name: name
properties.docs: Queue name.

interfaces.name: VisitorInfo
interfaces.docs:
The information about a visitor.
This information is visible to operators and can be updated by the SDK or operators.

properties.name: name
properties.docs: Visitor's name.

properties.name: email
properties.docs: Visitor's email address.

properties.name: phone
properties.docs: Visitor's phone number.

properties.name: note
properties.docs: Additional notes about the visitor.

properties.name: externalId
properties.docs: External ID to be used in third-party integrations.

properties.name: customAttributes
properties.docs: A dictionary with custom attributes.

properties.name: banned
properties.docs: Indicates whether the visitor is blocked.

interfaces.name: VisitorInfoUpdate
interfaces.docs:
Used to update visitor information.
If some fields of visitor information are not set, they will not be updated on the server.

properties.name: name
properties.docs:
Visitor's name.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: email
properties.docs:
Visitor's email address.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: phone
properties.docs:
Visitor's phone number.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: note
properties.docs:
Additional notes about the visitor.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: noteUpdateMethod
properties.docs:
The method for updating the notes about the visitor.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: externalId
properties.docs:
External ID to be used in third-party integrations.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: customAttributes
properties.docs:
A dictionary with custom attributes.
The default value is `undefined`.

properties.name: customAttributesUpdateMethod
properties.docs:
The method for updating custom attributes.
The default value is `undefined`.

typeAliases.name: AuthorizationMethod
typeAliases.docs:
Authorization method configuration.
Use this to specify how the SDK should authenticate with Glia services.

typeAliases.name: Region
typeAliases.docs: Site's region. Use `us` for US and other regions except Europe, use `eu` for Europe.

typeAliases.name: Queues
typeAliases.docs:
A collection of queues where:
- The key is the queue ID.
- The value is a `Queue` object that describes the queue's details.

typeAliases.name: Record
typeAliases.docs: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

typeAliases.name: AuthenticationBehavior
typeAliases.docs:
Behavior for authentication and deauthentication.
FORBIDDEN_DURING_ENGAGEMENT - Do not allow authentication and deauthentication during an ongoing engagement. Default behavior.
ALLOWED_DURING_ENGAGEMENT - Allow authentication and deauthentication during an ongoing engagement.

typeAliases.name: UnreadMessageCountCallback
typeAliases.docs: Callback function type for unread message count updates.
